resources.string: This dragonfly is small to medium in size, where the male is gray-blue-white with a wide belly
This dragonfly belongs to the type of medium-sized dragonfly with a rear wing span of 20-24mm
This dragonfly is large with a rear wing span of 31-33mm, this dragonfly habitat is an open area such as agricultural land
This dragonfly is small with a hind wings span of 22-24mm, this dragonfly can be found in open swamps
This dragonfly belongs to the dragonfly clan with striking red-brown wings, this dragonfly is widespread in Asia, one of which is Indonesia.
This dragonfly is known as the most common dragonfly species in Asia
Cherry Head turtles belonging to this type of omnivorous animal are able to consume everything from leaves, vegetables, fruits, worms, to insects.
Although classified as a land tortoise, it turns out that this type of exotic tortoise prefers habitats with humid conditions, for example near rivers.
As herbivores, the diet of the Leopard tortoise is generally in the form of leaves, vegetables, and fruits.
This type of tortoise has a characteristic yellow shell and has very hard characteristics. The Sulcata tortoise is also one of the largest land turtle species in the world
Not only appearance, this type of turtle also has an aggressive temperament and does not hesitate to bite if it feels threatened by the conditions around it.
The size of the Indian Star tortoise is also quite small, ranging from 17-30 centimeters. This species of tortoise is also able to live up to 80 years, with an average of 30-55 years as a pet.
These ants measure 2.5 - 3 mm with a shiny black color and we often encounter in the kitchen or bedroom
This ant is copper brown on the head and body, with a darker color, this ant has a queen who has a length of 5/8mm and another thing with its workers who have a length of 1/8 - 1/4
The legs and belly are white with a length of 1-16mm, the queen of this type of ant is polygamous to produce eggs
This ant has 6 legs with 12 segmented antennae and does not end with a dot, eats sweet foods such as sugar and candy
This type of ant is attracted to foods that have high protein such as meat, fat, dead insects etc.
These ants are often found on moist wood and dry wood, this type of ant feeds on sweet liquids, plant residues, and insect residues
Snakes are widely distributed in Sub-Saharan Africa, Nepal, India, Sri Lanka, Myanmar, South China, Southeast Asia, Indonesia.
This type of snake has the ability to flatten its neck to form a spoon or hood
This snake is one of the most deadly snakes, besides being deadly, this snake has two colors like rings on its body
This snake is often found in trees with a small and slender body
